00011 #include <mcMd/diagnostics/SystemDiagnostic.h>  // base class template
00012 #include <util/accumulators/Average.h>          // member
00013 #include <mcMd/util/FileMaster.h>  
00014 
00015 namespace McMd
00016 {
00017 
00018    using namespace Util;
00019 
00025    template <class SystemType>
00026    class AverageDiagnostic : public SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>
00027    {
00028    
00029    public:
00030 
00034       AverageDiagnostic(SystemType& system);
00035 
00039       virtual void readParam(std::istream& in);
00040 
00044       virtual void setup();
00045 
00049       virtual void output();
00050 
00051    protected:
00052 
00054       std::ofstream outputFile_;
00055 
00057       Average  accumulator_;
00058 
00060       int nSamplePerBlock_;
00061 
00062    };
00063 
00064    /* 
00065    * Constructor.
00066    */
00067    template <class SystemType>
00068    AverageDiagnostic<SystemType>::AverageDiagnostic(SystemType& system)
00069     : SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>(system),
00070       outputFile_(),
00071       accumulator_(),
00072       nSamplePerBlock_(1)
00073    {}
00074 
00075    /*
00076    * Read parameters and initialize.
00077    */
00078    template <class SystemType>
00079    void AverageDiagnostic<SystemType>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00080    {
00081 
00082       Diagnostic::readInterval(in);
00083       Diagnostic::readOutputFileName(in);
00084       ParamComposite::read<int>(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00085 
00086       accumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00087 
00088       // If nSamplePerBlock != 0, open an output file for block averages.
00089       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00090          Diagnostic::fileMaster().openOutputFile(
00091                              Diagnostic::outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00092       }
00093 
00094    }
00095 
00096    /*
00097    * Clear accumulators.
00098    */
00099    template <class SystemType>
00100    void AverageDiagnostic<SystemType>::setup()
00101    {  accumulator_.clear(); }
00102 
00103    /*
00104    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00105    */
00106    template <class SystemType>
00107    void AverageDiagnostic<SystemType>::output() 
00108    { 
00109       // If outputFile_ was used to write block averages, close it.
00110       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00111          outputFile_.close();
00112       }
00113      
00114       // Write parameter block to *.prm file
00115       Diagnostic::fileMaster().openOutputFile(Diagnostic::outputFileName(".prm"), 
00116                                               outputFile_);
00117       ParamComposite::writeParam(outputFile_); 
00118       outputFile_.close();
00119 
00120       // Write average value to *.avefile
00121       Diagnostic::fileMaster().openOutputFile(Diagnostic::outputFileName(".ave"), 
00122                                               outputFile_);
00123       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00124       outputFile_.close();
00125 
00126    }
00127    
00128 }
00129 #endif
